## StatementResult interface

Result of a SQL statement execution.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface StatementResult 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [generatedId](./db.statementresult.generatedid.md) | <code>number</code> | When inserting into a table with an auto-generated id column, this is the inserted id value. |
|  [numAffectedRows](./db.statementresult.numaffectedrows.md) | <code>number</code> | Number of table rows affected by the statement (e.g. inserted, updated or deleted). |
